features.featureTitle: Remove the entire TestimonialsSection component and all its references from App.tsx, including the import statement and the component render call

Create a new EliteClientProfilesSection component with section title 'Elite Client Profiles', featuring 3 premium profile cards in a horizontal layout on desktop and stacked on mobile. Each card must include: circular professional profile picture, full name, position, company type (e.g., FinTech, SaaS, Enterprise AI), and 2-3 line testimonial. Apply subtle neon border glow, glassmorphism or soft gradient dark card background, smooth hover animation with lift and glow increase effects, and maintain clean spacing and equal alignment across all cards

Remove the entire PricingSection component and all its references from App.tsx, including the import statement and the component render call. Ensure no layout shift occurs and spacing consistency is maintained

Create a new AIPerformanceSection component with heading 'AI-Driven Performance Intelligence' and subtitle 'Real-time automation metrics powered by intelligent systems.' Implement a 2-column grid layout on desktop (stacked on mobile) displaying 4 animated metric counters with neon highlight accents and supporting labels: 'Workflow Automation Rate: 87% Tasks Automated', 'Operational Processing Speed: 6.4x Faster Execution', 'AI Decision Accuracy: 98.7% Model Precision', 'Manual Intervention Reduced: -72% Human Dependency'. Counters must animate upward smoothly on scroll with fade and count effects using the existing useCounterAnimation hook

Add an authority testimonial block within the AIPerformanceSection component, positioned below the metrics grid. Display the quote: 'SwiftOps AI automation reduced operational delays by 43% within 90 days.' with attribution 'â€” Operations Director, FinTech Company'. Apply center alignment, slight italic styling, soft neon glow accent line, and maintain professional corporate tone matching the existing design system

Integrate the generated Connected Workflow image (workflow-connected.dim_1200x600.png) into the AIPerformanceSection with subtle animations including flowing light lines, pulse nodes, and soft moving gradient effects. Ensure the image is fully responsive, appears below metrics on mobile, matches the dark neon brand aesthetic, and does not impact performance negatively

Render the EliteClientProfilesSection component in App.tsx at the position previously occupied by TestimonialsSection, and render the AIPerformanceSection component at the position previously occupied by PricingSection. Maintain the existing section order and ensure smooth scroll navigation remains functional
